data.eml:eml: A new Roncus species (Pseudoscorpiones: Neobisiidae) from Montseny Natural Park (Catalonia, Spain), with remarks on karyology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zaragoza, Juan A., Áhlavský, Franti Š Ek Š Ť (2008): A new Roncus species (Pseudoscorpiones: Neobisiidae) from Montseny Natural Park (Catalonia, Spain), with remarks on karyology. Zootaxa 1693: 27-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180666
